channel.title: Friedrich Rieber
channel.description: This Friedrich Rieber's personal Webpage Created with Jekyll

item.title: OpenCV Project PLuTO
item.description:
PLuTO (Puck Lokalisierung und Tracking mit OpenCv) German for “Puck Localisation and Tracking with OpenCV” is a Software designed for Physik Students.

At TU Berlin Physik Students try to simulate Particels in a Gas with Hockey like Pucks on a Air Table.

This Software is to help the Students with Tracking the Pucks.

  • Friedrich Rieber

item.title: First Blog Post
item.description:
This is my first Blog Post. Testing out Jekylls Static Site Builder.

My Goal with this Blog is to document my personal Projects, which are listed on my GitHub Account.

In addition to that some tipps and tricks about multiple Topics and other Projects which are not big enough to get their own repository.

  • Friedrich Rieber
